title: Taran Matharu The Summoner 4 Books Collection Set
description: Demons, magic and epic adventure - introducing the books in the New York Times bestselling Summoner Trilogy...Fletcher was nothing more than a humble blacksmith's apprentice, when a chance encounter leads to the discovery that he has the ability to summon demons from another world. Titles in this set contains The Novice, The Battlemage, The Inquisition and The Outcast.
author: Taran Matharu
